meanings.definition: Not showing or having the qualities of a son or daughter.
meanings.sent1: The nonfilial child refused to help their parents with chores.
meanings.sent2: The nonfilial behavior of the teenager upset their family.
meanings.sent3: It was clear the cat was nonfilial when it ignored its owner's calls.
meanings.sent4: The weeds in the garden grew nonfilially, overshadowing the flowers.
meanings.sent5: The nonfilial student never thanked their teacher for the help.

meanings.definition: Not related by blood to one's parents.
meanings.sent1: The nonfilial aunt was loved just as much as a blood relative.
meanings.sent2: The nonfilial siblings shared a strong bond despite not being biologically related.
meanings.sent3: The nonfilial dog wagged its tail happily when its owner returned home.
meanings.sent4: The nonfilial tree provided shade to all, regardless of blood ties.
meanings.sent5: The nonfilial friendship between the neighbors was built on trust and respect.
